name: The child's height
instruction:
![](https://course-qa-basics.s3.us-west-1.amazonaws.com/section-2-course-5-task-14.png)

In one year, the boy Mike's height increased by 9 cm. Find the boy's height.

Create a `mikeHeight` variable with a value of `120`:

Write a command that increases the existing value of the `mikeHeight` variable by `9`.
